messages.content: ComfyUI-LightGlue is an implementation of LightGlue in ComfyUI to generate MotionBrush for DragNUWA.
What is the purpose of ComfyUI-LightGlue?
The purpose of ComfyUI-LightGlue is to generate MotionBrush for DragNUWA using the LightGlue implementation.
To install ComfyUI-LightGlue, clone the repo into the custom_nodes directory of ComfyUI location and run pip install -r requirements.txt.
Where can I find example workflows for ComfyUI-LightGlue?
You can find example workflows for ComfyUI-LightGlue in the assets folder of the GitHub repository, specifically wf_video.png and wf_motionbrush.png.
Where can I access the JSON files for the example workflows?

You can access the JSON files for the example workflows on GitHub at https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-LightGlue/blob/main/workflow_video.json and https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-LightGlue/blob/main/workflow_lightgluemotionbrush.json.
What tool is available for visualizing Motion Brush?
There is a Motion Brush Visualization Tool available at https://chaojie.github.io/ComfyUI-LightGlue/tools/draw.html.
Yes, ComfyUI-LightGlue is open-source and available on GitHub at https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-LightGlue.
